item.title: 20 Best Black Friday TV Deals (2025)
item.description: Here are the best deals on screens from Hisense, TCL, Samsung, Sony, and more this shopping holiday.

item.title: This Alienware Laptop Is the Best Gaming Laptop Deal Going Right Now
item.description: Finding a cheap gaming laptop that doesn't suck ain't easy. But I found it.

item.title: The Best Walking Pad is 30% Off With This Cyber Week Sale
item.description: The Urevo CyberPad for Home is an extremely capable walking pad with a 14 percent incline. It's now well under $500.

item.title: Stock Up On Lifestraw Personal Water Filters During This Sale
item.description: WIRED readers are weirdly obsessed with this backpacking water filter. It's cheap, and it's yours.

item.title: The Rocco Fridge Isn't So Smart, But It Sure Is Pretty
item.description: What the Rocco fridge lacks in smarts, it makes up for in looks. You have a few hours left to save on the brand's Black Friday sale.
